display_long_description:
If you enjoy this free game and have ideas or feedback, please feel free to contact us at meta-developer@chummi.sg. If your suggestion is adopted, our team will create a custom outfit or item exclusively for you — it can be something you love in real life, something from your imagination, or even inspired by your favorite friend or pet. Our artists will bring it to Poker Odyssey just for you.

Welcome to Poker Odyssey, a social-first multiplayer VR experience that blends immersive environments with classic competitive gameplay.

At its core is a vibrant Texas Hold’em arena designed for casual hangouts, serious showdowns, and everything in between. Join friends or meet new ones around the table, voice chat in real-time, and climb the leaderboard as you sharpen your skills.

But this is only the beginning — Poker Odyssey is built for expansion. Future updates will bring new table games, interactive lounge spaces, and personalized avatars, making this the ultimate social gaming destination in VR.

Whether you're in it for the strategy, the company, or the thrill of the game — your journey starts here.

Key features:
– Realistic VR poker gameplay (Texas Hold’em)
– Social interaction via proximity voice chat
– Matchmaking, leaderboards, and private rooms
– Regular content updates and new game modes coming soon
